org.jetel.graph.modelview

Interface MVEdge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MVGraphElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MVEngineEdge

    public interface MVEdge
extends MVGraphElement
    This is general model view to an edge. This model view is used by MetadataPropagationResolver.

      • setNoMetadata

        void setNoMetadata(MVMetadata noMetadata)
        Sets 'no metadata' for this edge. The 'no metadata' are metadata which would be used for this edge if no direct metadata is set on this edge.
        Parameters:
        noMetadata -

      • getNoMetadata

        MVMetadata getNoMetadata()
        Returns:
        'no metadata' for this edge - metadata which would be used if no direct metadata is set on this edge
